name: GOAT GAINS
description: Goat Gains operates by deploying an AI agent designed to monitor the meme coin landscape. This agent analyzes real-time data to identify meme coins with high liquidity and transaction volumes. By interacting with these coins, the AI agent collects transaction fees, which are then redistributed to $GGAINS token holders proportionally. This mechanism allows holders to benefit from the volatile yet lucrative meme coin market without active trading.
